title: Exiles.End.REPACK-ALiAS
description:
Exile's End is an homage to early 90's action-adventure PC games          
     like Flashback and Another World, but with a Japanese flair. The          
     core of the game is from Australian game maker Magnetic Realms with       
     art, cutscenes, and music provided by legends of the 8 and 16-bit         
     eras from Japan. It draws its thematic influence from the                 
     science-fiction films and anime of the 80's and its gameplay from         
     classic Amiga and Commodore 64 action-adventures.                         
                                                                               
     - Music From Keiji Yamagishi (Ninja Gaiden NES, Tecmo Bowl, Captain       
       Tsubasa)                                                                
                                                                               
     - Art by staff from Secret of Mana,First Kiss Story, Mother 3, and        
       more!                                                                   
                                                                               
     - NES-style cutscenes by OPUS (Half-Minute Hero)                          
                                                                               
                                                                               
     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
